name: Convert specific currencies against your chosen base currency
description: Request specific exchange rates by listing the currencies and choosing the base rate you want to see the exchange against

properties.helptext: Rates are quoted against the Euro by default. Quote against a different currency by setting the base parameter e.g. 'USD'
List all the currencies you wish to see the exchange rates for, separated by commas. E.g. 'GBP,ZAR'
